Description:
Required Skills To Be SuccessfulBusiness analytical and Data management skills
Annual Budgeting, forecasting and Adhoc analysis
Operate SAP system and experience of Microsoft tools 
Ability to lead projects and manage stakeholders. About The Team The role will report to Aftersales Brand Lead and closely work with busy automotive aftersales team.  What Equips You For The RoleDegree in Business management or IT or Finance.
At least 5 years of experience in a similar job profile preferably from Automotive or retail industry  Job Details
